tasks.title: Collect and preprocess chest X-ray dataset
tasks.description: Gather 10,000 labeled chest X-rays from NIH and CheXpert datasets. Preprocess: resize to 512x512, normalize, augment

tasks.title: Implement EfficientNet baseline model
tasks.description: Code EfficientNet-B4 with transfer learning from ImageNet. Train initial model on preprocessed dataset

tasks.title: Run data augmentation ablation study
tasks.description: Test combinations: rotation (±15°), zoom (0.9-1.1), horizontal flip, contrast adjustment. Measure impact on validation accuracy

tasks.title: Submit IRB amendment for hospital dataset
tasks.description: Prepare and submit IRB amendment request for access to 5,000 additional X-rays from local hospital partner

tasks.title: Literature review on legal NLP systems
tasks.description: Survey existing work on contract analysis, clause extraction, risk assessment using NLP. Focus on transformer-based approaches

tasks.title: Meet with legal expert on annotation guidelines
tasks.description: Schedule consultation with domain expert to define what constitutes 'key clauses' and 'legal risks' for annotation task

tasks.title: Annotate 100 sample contracts
tasks.description: Using agreed guidelines, manually annotate 100 contracts for key clauses (definitions, obligations, termination, liability) and risks
